overview:
After receiving his bachelorâ€™s degree in information technology from Cochin University of Science and Technology, Binu Baby Kurian followed up with his Sun certification (Sun-Certified Java Professional).

He has five years of IT experience with expertise in C- language and Java technology, and spent the bulk of his career in a team leadership role at Zerone Consulting Pvt. Ltd. Binu has worked on many mobile phone projects based on Java ME, Symbian and iPhone. He has developed mobile software in the business and entertainment domains as well.
